data.name: WRC 9 Toyota Corolla 1999
data.detailed_description:
After making its debut in Rally Finland in 1997, the Toyota Corolla WRC quickly made its mark, earning its first victory at Monte Carlo to open the 1998 season. Toyota won its third Manufacturers' title the following year with this car. The Toyota Corolla is the Japanese maker's star!
Its 4-wheel drive and 300 hp turbo engine helped it become World Champion in 1999.
The record? In 95% of the races in which it took part, it reached the podium! A genuine 90s icon!
data.about_the_game:
After making its debut in Rally Finland in 1997, the Toyota Corolla WRC quickly made its mark, earning its first victory at Monte Carlo to open the 1998 season. Toyota won its third Manufacturers' title the following year with this car. The Toyota Corolla is the Japanese maker's star!
Its 4-wheel drive and 300 hp turbo engine helped it become World Champion in 1999.
The record? In 95% of the races in which it took part, it reached the podium! A genuine 90s icon!
data.short_description: The 1999 champion Toyota Corolla WRC has had the most prestigious drivers behind the wheel and reached the podium in 95% of the races it took part in! A genuine 90s icon!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 Go | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1 Go
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 | AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, 6 Go | AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 Go
  • DirectX: Version 12
